casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Jones, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Jones (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 44.]

(No. 98-1256 Submitted October 13, 1998 Decided December 2, 1998.) David H. Bodiker, Ohio Public Defender, and Jennifer D. Schaffer, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Cook (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 404, 700 N.E.2d 570.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
